guide.title: How to Create a Sticker Kit
guide.step1Desc: Click "Create New" to start. Just pick a name and background color!
guide.keyInfoDesc: It's the musical pitch reference. Choose "Auto" if unsure - it'll be set automatically. Notes in the same key sound good together.
guide.step2Desc: Go to the kit detail page and click "Add Sticker" to create stickers.
guide.drumDesc: Drum = Drums, claps, sound effects, etc.
guide.step3Desc: Tap a sticker to expand it, then set the image (PNG/JPG) and audio.
guide.libraryHint: (Recommended! Sounds that match the key are available)
guide.step4Desc: Once all stickers have images and audio, click "Publish" to share with everyone!
guide.hintDesc: Start small with 3-4 stickers. You can always add more once you're comfortable!
